actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to distribute seeds and plants for use in home gardens.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Agriculture to distribute, upon request and without cost, up to three packages of seeds per household for use in home gardening to produce food for the personal consumption of the household. Authorizes an appropriation of $6,000,000 to carry out the purposes of this Act. Limits the duration of this Act to three years.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of Agriculture to distribute seeds and plants for use in home gardens.
